sentence.value: Peter Siebold is a member of the Scaled Composites astronaut team [1] and was one of the test pilots for SpaceShipOne, the experimental spaceplane developed by Scaled Composites.
sentence.tree: nn(Siebold/NNP-2,Peter/NNP-1) nsubj(member/NN-5,Siebold/NNP-2) cop(member/NN-5,is/VBZ-3) det(member/NN-5,a/DT-4) ccomp(developed/VBN-28,member/NN-5) det(team/NN-11,the/DT-7) nn(team/NN-11,Scaled/NNP-8) nn(team/NN-11,Composites/NNPS-9) nn(team/NN-11,astronaut/NN-10) prep_of(member/NN-5,team/NN-11) punct(1/CD-13,-LSB-/-LRB--12) prep(team/NN-11,1/CD-13) punct(1/CD-13,-RSB-/-RRB--14) cop(one/CD-17,was/VBD-16) conj_and(member/NN-5,one/CD-17) ccomp(developed/VBN-28,one/CD-17) det(pilots/NNS-21,the/DT-19) nn(pilots/NNS-21,test/NN-20) prep_of(one/CD-17,pilots/NNS-21) prep_for(one/CD-17,SpaceShipOne/NNP-23) det(spaceplane/NN-27,the/DT-25) amod(spaceplane/NN-27,experimental/JJ-26) nsubj(developed/VBN-28,spaceplane/NN-27) nn(Composites/NNPS-31,Scaled/NNP-30) prep_by(developed/VBN-28,Composites/NNPS-31)

sentence.value: [2] On 8 April 2004, Siebold piloted the second powered test flight of SpaceShipOne, flight 13P, which reached a top speed of Mach 1.6 and an altitude of 32.0 kilometers.
sentence.tree: punct(2/CD-2,-LSB-/-LRB--1) prep(piloted/VBD-10,2/CD-2) punct(2/CD-2,-RSB-/-RRB--3) prep_on(piloted/VBD-10,8/CD-5) tmod(piloted/VBD-10,April/NNP-6) num(April/NNP-6,2004/CD-7) nsubj(piloted/VBD-10,Siebold/NNP-9) det(flight/NN-15,the/DT-11) amod(flight/NN-15,second/JJ-12) amod(flight/NN-15,powered/VBN-13) nn(flight/NN-15,test/NN-14) dobj(piloted/VBD-10,flight/NN-15) prep_of(flight/NN-15,SpaceShipOne/NNP-17) nn(13P/NN-20,flight/NN-19) appos(flight/NN-15,13P/NN-20) nsubj(reached/VBD-23,which/WDT-22) rcmod(flight/NN-15,reached/VBD-23) det(speed/NN-26,a/DT-24) amod(speed/NN-26,top/JJ-25) dobj(reached/VBD-23,speed/NN-26) prep_of(speed/NN-26,Mach/NNP-28) num(Mach/NNP-28,1.6/CD-29) det(altitude/NN-32,an/DT-31) dobj(reached/VBD-23,altitude/NN-32) conj_and(speed/NN-26,altitude/NN-32) num(kilometers/NNS-35,32.0/CD-34) prep_of(altitude/NN-32,kilometers/NNS-35)

sentence.value: Siebold holds a degree in aerospace engineering from California Polytechnic University; a design engineer at Scaled Composites since 1996, Siebold was responsible for the simulator, navigation system, and ground control system for the SpaceShipOne project.
sentence.tree: nsubj(holds/VBZ-2,Siebold/NNP-1) ccomp(responsible/JJ-24,holds/VBZ-2) det(degree/NN-4,a/DT-3) dobj(holds/VBZ-2,degree/NN-4) nn(engineering/NN-7,aerospace/NN-6) prep_in(degree/NN-4,engineering/NN-7) nn(University/NNP-11,California/NNP-9) nn(University/NNP-11,Polytechnic/NNP-10) prep_from(holds/VBZ-2,University/NNP-11) det(engineer/NN-15,a/DT-13) nn(engineer/NN-15,design/NN-14) dep(University/NNP-11,engineer/NN-15) nn(Composites/NNP-18,Scaled/NNP-17) prep_at(engineer/NN-15,Composites/NNP-18) prep_since(Composites/NNP-18,1996/CD-20) nsubj(responsible/JJ-24,Siebold/NNP-22) cop(responsible/JJ-24,was/VBD-23) det(simulator/NN-27,the/DT-26) prep_for(responsible/JJ-24,simulator/NN-27) nn(system/NN-30,navigation/NN-29) prep_for(responsible/JJ-24,system/NN-30) conj_and(simulator/NN-27,system/NN-30) nn(system/NN-35,ground/NN-33) nn(system/NN-35,control/NN-34) prep_for(responsible/JJ-24,system/NN-35) conj_and(simulator/NN-27,system/NN-35) det(project/NN-39,the/DT-37) nn(project/NN-39,SpaceShipOne/NNP-38) prep_for(responsible/JJ-24,project/NN-39)

sentence.value: Although he was one of four qualified pilots for SpaceShipOne, Siebold did not pilot the craft during the flights later in 2004 to meet the requirements of the Ansari X Prize.
sentence.tree: mark(one/CD-4,Although/IN-1) nsubj(one/CD-4,he/PRP-2) cop(one/CD-4,was/VBD-3) advcl(pilot/NN-15,one/CD-4) num(pilots/NNS-8,four/CD-6) amod(pilots/NNS-8,qualified/VBN-7) prep_of(one/CD-4,pilots/NNS-8) prep_for(pilots/NNS-8,SpaceShipOne/NNP-10) nsubj(pilot/NN-15,Siebold/NNP-12) aux(pilot/NN-15,did/VBD-13) neg(pilot/NN-15,not/RB-14) det(craft/NN-17,the/DT-16) dobj(pilot/NN-15,craft/NN-17) det(flights/NNS-20,the/DT-19) prep_during(craft/NN-17,flights/NNS-20) advmod(flights/NNS-20,later/RB-21) prep_in(later/RB-21,2004/CD-23) aux(meet/VB-25,to/TO-24) xcomp(pilot/NN-15,meet/VB-25) det(requirements/NNS-27,the/DT-26) dobj(meet/VB-25,requirements/NNS-27) det(Prize/NNP-32,the/DT-29) nn(Prize/NNP-32,Ansari/NNP-30) nn(Prize/NNP-32,X/NN-31) prep_of(requirements/NNS-27,Prize/NNP-32)

sentence.value: [3] Although Siebold flew SpaceShipOne to an altitude of 32 km (just under 20 miles), he did not cross the 100 km Kármán line -- the international standard for reaching space.
sentence.tree: punct(3/LS-2,-LSB-/-LRB--1) dep(cross/VB-24,3/LS-2) punct(3/LS-2,-RSB-/-RRB--3) mark(flew/VBD-6,Although/IN-4) nsubj(flew/VBD-6,Siebold/NNP-5) advcl(cross/VB-24,flew/VBD-6) dobj(flew/VBD-6,SpaceShipOne/NNP-7) det(altitude/NN-10,an/DT-9) prep_to(flew/VBD-6,altitude/NN-10) num(km/NN-13,32/CD-12) prep_of(altitude/NN-10,km/NN-13) advmod(under/IN-16,just/RB-15) quantmod(20/CD-17,under/IN-16) num(miles/NNS-18,20/CD-17) appos(km/NN-13,miles/NNS-18) nsubj(cross/VB-24,he/PRP-21) aux(cross/VB-24,did/VBD-22) neg(cross/VB-24,not/RB-23) det(line/NN-29,the/DT-25) number(km/NN-27,100/CD-26) amod(line/NN-29,km/NN-27) nn(line/NN-29,Kármán/NN-28) dobj(cross/VB-24,line/NN-29) det(standard/NN-33,the/DT-31) amod(standard/NN-33,international/JJ-32) dep(line/NN-29,standard/NN-33) prepc_for(standard/NN-33,reaching/VBG-35) dobj(reaching/VBG-35,space/NN-36)

sentence.value: For his contribution to the project, Siebold, along with Mike Melvill and Brian Binnie, received the 2004 Iven C. Kincheloe Award presented by the Society of Experimental Test Pilots.
sentence.tree: poss(contribution/NN-3,his/PRP$-2) prep_for(received/VBD-18,contribution/NN-3) det(project/NN-6,the/DT-5) prep_to(contribution/NN-3,project/NN-6) nsubj(received/VBD-18,Siebold/NNP-8) nn(Melvill/NNP-13,Mike/NNP-12) prep_along_with(Siebold/NNP-8,Melvill/NNP-13) nn(Binnie/NNP-16,Brian/NNP-15) prep_along_with(Siebold/NNP-8,Binnie/NNP-16) conj_and(Melvill/NNP-13,Binnie/NNP-16) det(Award/NN-24,the/DT-19) num(Award/NN-24,2004/CD-20) nn(Award/NN-24,Iven/NNP-21) nn(Award/NN-24,C./NNP-22) nn(Award/NN-24,Kincheloe/NNP-23) dobj(received/VBD-18,Award/NN-24) partmod(Award/NN-24,presented/VBN-25) det(Society/NNP-28,the/DT-27) agent(presented/VBN-25,Society/NNP-28) amod(Pilots/NNS-32,Experimental/JJ-30) nn(Pilots/NNS-32,Test/NN-31) prep_of(Society/NNP-28,Pilots/NNS-32)

sentence.value: He won the award a second time in 2009, this time individually.
sentence.annotated-sentence: He won [[the award|Award]] a second time in [[2009|2009]], this time individually.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: He won the award a second time in 2009, this time individually.
sentence.tree: nsubj(won/VBD-2,He/PRP-1) det(award/NN-4,the/DT-3) iobj(won/VBD-2,award/NN-4) det(time/NN-7,a/DT-5) amod(time/NN-7,second/JJ-6) dobj(won/VBD-2,time/NN-7) prep_in(time/NN-7,2009/CD-9) det(time/NN-12,this/DT-11) npadvmod(individually/RB-13,time/NN-12) advmod(won/VBD-2,individually/RB-13)

sentence.value: He was the pilot who flew the White Knight Two on its maiden flight on the 21st of December 2008.
sentence.annotated-sentence: He was the pilot who flew [[the White Knight Two|Scaled_Composites_White_Knight_Two]] on [[its maiden flight|Maiden_flight]] on the 21st of [[December 2008|December_2008]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: He was the pilot who flew the White Knight Two on its maiden flight on the 21st of December 2008.
